name: No Hungry Child
detail: This program is focused towards distributing nutritious & fresh food to poor, needy & hungry children in India.

name: Annapurnaa
detail: Helps distribute food to old age homes and supports the elderly.

name: Mid Day Meal
detail: MDMS is a school meal program that provides free lunch to children in local schools.

name: Mitti Cafe
detail: NGO for disabled people that empowers people to join together in fight against malnutrition.

name: Akshaya Patra Kitchen
detail: Program to provide affordable meals for everyone by building public kitchens.

name: PM-Poshan
detail: Centrally Sponsored Scheme that provides a hot cooked meal to children.

name: Annadan
detail: Program for children and underprivileged people in India.
